fields.description:
It appears that when we shut down a context, the associated XHR requests (and possibly other things) are not cleaned up in conjunction with them, or otherwise are being improperly managed. This behavior can be witnessed in Kitchen Sink:

* KS -> Platform -> XHR -> setTimeout
* Nav back via the top left button
* Wait for the crash
fields.summary: iOS: Cancel all requests associated with a context when it closes
fields.environment:
1.7.6.0aca382 (vanilla 1.7.6 + merge of pull 1009)
1.9.0.c3fc109

iPhone 2G iOS 3.1.2

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
